glossary.name: Today is the last day at school.
glossary.text: Hari ini hari terakhir masuk sekolah.

glossary.name: Mom!
glossary.text: Ibu!

glossary.text: Ada apa nak?

glossary.name: Ok, I will take it.

glossary.name: Nothing.

glossary.name: Ahh, I want to get clothe in the wardrobe.

glossary.name: Is the dinner ready, mom?

glossary.name: After getting dressed, go to the kitchen, we will have dinner.

glossary.name: Mom cooks your favorite chicken soup, sit down.

glossary.name: It's okay, but I will ask permission to take holiday.

glossary.name: It’s too hot!
glossary.text: Ini terlalu panas!

glossary.name: Eat it slowly, blow it first, wait until cool.

glossary.name: Don’t be in a hurry.
glossary.text: Jangan terburu-buru.

glossary.name: Ok mom, dad.
glossary.text: Baik bu, yah.

glossary.name: After you finish eating, you go back to your room and get ready for sleeping.

glossary.name: It's 9 pm, it's time to sleep.
glossary.text: Sudah jam 9 malam, saatnya aku tidur.

glossary.name: It's too cold tonight, i have to use my blanket, so i don't get cold.
glossary.text: Malam ini lumayan dingin, aku harus memakai selimut, biar tidak kedinginan.

glossary.name: You turn off the light, and go to sleep.
glossary.text: Kamu mematikan lampu, dan pergi tidur.

glossary.name: Good night.
glossary.text: Selamat malam.

glossary.name: Morning world!
glossary.text: Pagi dunia!

glossary.name: You're so excited this morning, what’s happened?
glossary.text: Semangat sekali kamu pagi ini, ada apa?

glossary.name: Dad, Mom, I'm Home!
glossary.text: Ayah, Ibu, Aku pulang!

glossary.name: Holiday has come. I can't wait to visit grandma's house
glossary.text: Liburan telah tiba. Aku tidak sabar pergi ke rumah nenek..

glossary.name: Finally, we have passed the final exam. Happy holidays!
glossary.text: Akhirnya, ujian akhir sudah kita lewati. Selamat berlibur!

glossary.name: Welcome, Why do you look
glossary.text: Selamat datang, Kenapa kamu terlihat senang sekali ?

glossary.name: You go home with a happy face.

glossary.name: Wow, a great idea. Dad, What do you think?
glossary.text: Wah, ide yang bagus. Bagaimana menurut ayah?

glossary.name: I want to visit grandma's house

glossary.name: Wow, it's a holiday, where do you want to go?
glossary.text: Wah, sudah liburan ya, kamu ingin kemana?

glossary.name: Before that I have to take a shower first.
glossary.text: sebelum itu aku harus mandi dulu.

glossary.name: Because today is a holiday, i will help mom with house work.
glossary.text: Karena hari ini libur, aku akan membantu ibu mengerjakan tugas rumah.

glossary.name: Oh how fresh it is!
glossary.text: Ahh Segarnya!

glossary.name: After taking shower, you get dressed quickly and go to the kitchen

glossary.name: Because today is holiday, i will help mom take care of the house work.

glossary.name: You are so kind

glossary.name: Ok mom.

glossary.name: A few minutes later

glossary.name: Tadaa, it's finish, let's have a breakfast together

glossary.name: Dad, let's have a breakfast

glossary.name: Let’s go.

glossary.name: Yes dear, dad will ask for holiday permission

glossary.name: Yeay, I'm waiting for the good news, dad

glossary.name: Okay, let's eat first. Your dad will be late
glossary.text: Sudah, ayo makan dulu. Nanti ayahmu keburu terlambat.

glossary.name: After finishing breakfast, dad goes to work

glossary.name: Yes, be careful

glossary.name: Be careful dad

glossary.name: After that you take a short break until noon

glossary.name: Mom, I want to go playing at Steven's house, he said he had a new toy
glossary.text: Ibu, aku mau pergi main ke rumahnya Steven dulu ya, katanya dia punya mainan baru.

glossary.name: Ok, be careful, you have to go home before 7pm
glossary.text: Baik nak, hati-hati, kamu harus pulang sebelum pukul 7 malam.

glossary.name: Okay mom. I go out now

glossary.name: While on the way to Steven's house, suddenly someone greets you from behind

glossary.name: You are shocked and look back

glossary.name: Hey Michael, where are you going
glossary.text: Ehh Michael, mau kemana kamu?

glossary.name: I am going to Steven's house
glossary.text: Aku mau kerumah Steven.

glossary.name: How come?  we are in the same direction?
glossary.text: Loh kok sama? Kita ke arah yang sama?

glossary.name: Yes, Steven has invited me to his house to show him his new toy
glossary.text: Iya, Steven mengajakku ke rumahnya untuk menunjukkan mainan baru nya.

glossary.name: I have also invited by Steven to his house to show him his new toy
glossary.text: Aku juga diajak Steven ke rumahnya untuk di tunjukkan mainan baru nya

glossary.name: I can't wait to get there!

glossary.name: This?
glossary.text: Ini?

glossary.name: Ohh this is a Tablet, people use it to browse the internet, read e-books, and watch movie.
glossary.text: Ohh ini adalah Tablet, orang menggunakannya untuk browsing internet, membaca e-book, dan menonton film.

glossary.name: Wow, that's great

glossary.name: How about you, what are you bringing?

glossary.name: Finally, you arrive at Steven's house
glossary.text: Akhirnya, kalian sampai di rumah Steven.

glossary.name: Wait a second

glossary.name: Wow you have come guys, come in!

glossary.name: What toy would you like to show, Steven?

glossary.name: This is PlayStation5, people use it to play video games
glossary.text: Ini adalah PlayStation5, orang menggunakannya untuk bermain video game.

glossary.name: Wow it is to play games? That's great!
glossary.text: Wahh untuk bermain game? Mantab sekali!

glossary.name: Then, what is this, Steven?

glossary.name: Yes, it's so fun

glossary.name: Yes, i say goodbye too
glossary.text: Iya, aku juga pamit pulang.

glossary.name: Yes, you can play here again anytime

glossary.name: Sure!

glossary.text: Aku pulang dulu ya.

glossary.name: Be careful

glossary.name: I’m home!

glossary.name: Welcome. How do you feel today?

glossary.name: After finishing breakfast, you and your family go to grandma's house

glossary.name: Dad, how long does it take to get to grandma's house?
glossary.text: Ayah, berapa lama perjalanan menuju ke rumah nenek?

glossary.name: The trip to grandma's house is about 6 hours. We will arrive in the afternoon. Hopefully it doesn't get stuck in traffic
glossary.text: Perjalanan ke rumah nenek sekitar 6 jam. Kita akan sampai pada sore hari. Semoga saja tidak macet.

glossary.name: In the middle of the road you see a unique car
glossary.text: Di tengah jalan kamu melihat mobil yang unik.

glossary.name: Dad, what car is that? very nice shape
glossary.text: Ayah, mobil apa itu ? bentuknya bagus sekali

glossary.name: It's an electric car. The car needs electricity to run, so it doesn't need petrol anymore
glossary.text: Itu adalah mobil listrik. Mobil itu memerlukan listrik untuk berjalan, jadi tidak perlu bensin lagi.

glossary.name: Wow, that's really cool. I want to have an electric car someday
glossary.text: Wahh keren sekali. Aku ingin punya mobil listrik suatu saat nanti.

glossary.name: After a long journey, finally you arrive at grandma's house

glossary.name: Soon, you've arrived at the zoo
glossary.text: Tidak terasa, kamu sudah sampai di kebun binatang.

glossary.name: We have arrived, let's go out from the car
glossary.text: Sudah sampai, ayo turun.

glossary.name: Yeay, we have arrived
glossary.text: Asikk sudah sampai.

glossary.name: Wow there are so many animals here
glossary.text: Wahh banyak sekali hewan disini.

glossary.name: What is that animal Grandma? It is so tall
glossary.text: Nenek itu hewan apa? Dia tinggi sekali.

glossary.name: It's a giraffe, the giraffe has a very long neck
glossary.text: Itu adalah jerapah, jerapah mempunyai leher yang sangat panjang.

glossary.name: Wow, that's so high
glossary.text: Wahh tinggi sekali.

glossary.name: What is that animal Grandma? it has spots on it’s body
glossary.text: Kalau itu hewan apa nenek? Dia mempunyai bintik-bintik di tubuhnya.

glossary.name: It's a cheetah, the cheetah is one of the fastest animals in the world. Cheetah can run at a speed of 103km/h
glossary.text: Itu adalah cheetah, cheetah adalah salah satu hewan tercepat di dunia. Cheetah mampu berlari dengan kecepatan 103km/jam

glossary.name: Wow, that's so fast, grandma
glossary.text: Wahh sangat cepat sekali nek

glossary.name: It is a pity, we have to protect rhino from the extinction
glossary.text: Kasihan sekali badak itu, kita harus menjaganya agar dia tidak punah.

glossary.name: That's right
glossary.text: Iya betul sekali

glossary.name: What is that animal grandma? The color is unique
glossary.text: Kalau itu hewan apa nek? warnanya unik.

glossary.name: It's a zebra. Zebras have black and white stripes
glossary.text: Itu adalah zebra. Zebra mempunyai warna belang hitam dan putih.

glossary.name: They are very funny, like a zebra cross
glossary.text: Lucu sekali, seperti jalur penyebrangan pejalan kaki

glossary.name: That's why the pedestrian crossing is called a Zebra Cross. Because the color is like a zebra
glossary.text: Itulah kenapa jalur penyebrangan pejalan kaki disebut Zebra Cross. Karena warnanya seperti zebra.

glossary.name: Wow, I have just known it, Grandma
glossary.text: Wahh aku baru tahu nek.

glossary.name: You are continue to go around the zoo with your family until the afternoon
glossary.text: Kamu melanjutkan berkeliling kebun binatang bersama keluargamu hingga sore hari.

glossary.name: Ohhh I'm so tired after walking around the zoo
glossary.text: Ahhh aku capek sekali setelah berkeliling kebun binatang.

glossary.name: But I'm so happy to know more about the animals here. Thank you grandma
glossary.text: Tapi aku senang sekali karena tahu lebih banyak tentang hewan-hewan disini. Terimakasih nenek.

glossary.name: You're welcome
glossary.text: Sama-sama.

glossary.name: Let's go home
glossary.text: Ayo kita pulang.

glossary.name: Before going home, let's shopping at a gift shop
glossary.text: Sebelum pulang kita mampir dulu ke toko oleh-oleh.

glossary.name: Ok
glossary.text: Baiklah.

glossary.name: Wow, it is a huge shop, and there are many kinds of foods and snacks
glossary.text: Wah besar sekali tokonya, dan banyak macam-macam oleh-oleh juga.

glossary.name: I want to buy some snacks, what do you want
glossary.text: Ibu mau membeli beberapa oleh-oleh, kamu mau apa?

glossary.name: I want chocolate bakpia
glossary.text: Aku mau bakpia coklat.

glossary.name: Okay
glossary.text: Baiklah.

glossary.name: After shopping, you leave the store
glossary.text: Setelah selesai berbelanja, kamu keluar toko.

glossary.name: Mom I want my bakpia
glossary.text: Ibu aku mau bakpia ku.

glossary.name: This is your bakpia
glossary.text: Ini bakpia mu.

glossary.name: Mom, where do I throw this plastic? There are 2 trash cans
glossary.text: Ibu ini plastiknya aku buang dimana? Ini ada 2 tempat sampah.

glossary.name: This one is for organic waste, and this one is for non-organic waste
glossary.text: Yang ini untuk sampah organic, dan yang ini untuk sampah non organic.

glossary.name: What is it mom
glossary.text: Apa itu ibu?

glossary.name: Organic waste is waste such as food scraps, fruit scraps, and vegetable scraps
glossary.text: Sampah organic adalah sampah seperti sisa makanan, sisa buah, dan sisa sayur

glossary.name: Non-organic waste is plastic waste like your food plastic
glossary.text: Sampah non organic adalah sampah sampah plastic seperi plastic makananmu ini.

glossary.name: So I have to throw this garbage into the non-organic trash, right
glossary.text: Jadi aku harus buang sampah ini ke tempat sampah non organic ya bu?

glossary.name: Yes you are right
glossary.text: Iya betul sekali.

glossary.name: Good, now let's go home
glossary.text: Bagus, sekarang ayo kita pulang.

glossary.name: You go back to grandma's house
glossary.text: Kamu pun pulang menuju rumah nenek.

glossary.name: We finally arrived
glossary.text: Akhirnya kita sampai juga

glossary.name: When will you go home
glossary.text: Kalian akan pulang kapan?

glossary.name: After this we will go home mom
glossary.text: Habis ini kita langsung lanjut pulang ibu.

glossary.name: Ohh don't stay overnight
glossary.text: Ohh tidak menginap dulu?

glossary.name: No mom, because I have to go back to work tomorrow
glossary.text: Tidak ibu, karena saya besok sudah harus Kembali bekerja.

glossary.name: Huhh.. why we go home so early, dad
glossary.text: Yahh.. kok sudah pulang sih yah…

glossary.name: It's okay dear. We will meet again on the next semester holiday
glossary.text: Tidak apa-apa nak. Kita akan bertemu lagi saat liburan semester nanti

glossary.name: Yeayyy, okay grandma
glossary.text: Yeayyy, baiklah nenek.

glossary.name: Mom, this is a gift that I have bought earlier, some of fruits and vegetables are also complete in the kitchen. you just cooks them, mom.
glossary.text: Ibu ini oleh-oleh yang tadi aku beli, stok buah dan sayur juga sudah lengkap ada di dapur. Ibu tinggal masak saja.

glossary.name: Thank you dear
glossary.text: Terimakasih ya nak

glossary.name: Yes, be careful
glossary.text: Iya hati hati dijalan.

glossary.name: Goodbye grandma
glossary.text: Dada nenek!

glossary.name: Goodbye, be careful
glossary.text: Dada, hati hati.

glossary.name: You go home
glossary.text: Kalian pun pulang ke rumah.

glossary.name: What is that animal Grandma? it has a horns on the tip of it’s head
glossary.text: Kalau itu hewan apa nek. Dia mempunyai tanduk di ujung kepalanya.

glossary.name: It's a rhino. The one-horned rhino is an animal that is highly protected because it is threatened with extinction
glossary.text: Itu adalah badak.  Badak bercula satu adalah hewan yang sangat di lindungi karena terancam punah.

glossary.name: Ok we have arrived
glossary.text: Nah kita sudah sampai.

glossary.name: Ok mom, now I understand
glossary.text: Baik ibu, sekarang aku sudah paham

glossary.name: Ok mom then we say goodbye to go home
glossary.text: Baik ibu kalau begitu kami pamit pulang dulu.

glossary.name: Yes, mom
glossary.text: Baik bu.

glossary.name: I feel so fresh after shower.
glossary.text: Segar sekali setelah mandi.

glossary.name: You go to your room and take a shower.
glossary.text: Kamu pergi ke kamar mu dan mandi.

glossary.name: It's on the top of wardrobe, i can’t get it, the wardrobe is too high.
glossary.text: Itu ada di lemari yang paling atas, aku tidak sampai untuk mengambilnya, lemarinya terlalu tinggi.

glossary.name: What's wrong with the clothe?
glossary.text: Ada apa dengan bajunya?

glossary.name: I want to take the clothe in the wardrobe.
glossary.text: Aku mau mengambil baju di lemari.

glossary.name: You come to mom.
glossary.text: Kamu pergi menghampiri ibu.

glossary.name: I can’t reach it because is too high. I need a help.
glossary.text: Aku tidak sampai untuk mengambilnya karena terlalu tinggi. Aku butuh bantuan.

glossary.name: You try to take your clothe.
glossary.text: Kamu berusaha mengambil bajumu.

glossary.name: Where is my favorite clothe?
glossary.text: Dimana ya baju favoritku?

glossary.name: It is on the top of wardrobe..
glossary.text: Ternyata ada di paling atas lemari.

glossary.name: After taking a shower, you open the wardrobe.
glossary.text: Setelah mandi, kamu membuka lemari pakaian.

glossary.name: Yeayy. I will eat chicken soup right now.
glossary.text: Wahh asik. Aku akan langsung makan sup ayamnya.

glossary.name: you take a shower
glossary.text: kamu mandi

glossary.name: You eat your mother's chicken soup right away.
glossary.text: kamu makan sup ayam buatan ibumu segera.

glossary.name: Oh, it is on the top of wardrobe
glossary.text: oh, ternyata ada di paling atas lemari.

glossary.name: Ok Grandma, I will sleep.
glossary.text: Baik nek, aku tidur dulu ya.

glossary.name: Ok mom.
glossary.text: Baik bu.

glossary.name: I'm really tired today
glossary.text: Aku capek sekali hari ini

glossary.name: I have bought some fruits and vegetables, for you, grandma
glossary.text: Beli beberapa buah dan sayur nek, untuk stok nenek.
